main_definition: to become visible or come into existence; to show up unexpectedly or appear in a certain way.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become visible, especially suddenly or after being hidden.
meanings_and_examples.example: The magician made the rabbit disappear and then it appeared out of his pocket.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To seem a certain way to others, often unintentionally or due to misunderstanding.
meanings_and_examples.example: When she spoke loudly at the library, many people seemed surprised by her behavior.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become known or recognized in a particular context.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new technology appeared on the market just as smartphones were gaining popularity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To show up or arrive unexpectedly, often without prior notice.
meanings_and_examples.example: He didn't expect his old friend to appear at the party out of nowhere.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To come into existence or be revealed in a certain situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: The solution appeared as he was working through the complex problem, much to his relief.
